#summary Gradle build script for HelloSpock project.

{{{
project(":hello-spock") {
  repositories {
    mavenCentral()
    mavenRepo urls: "http://m2repo.spockframework.org/snapshots"
  }
  
  dependencies {
    groovy "org.codehaus.groovy:groovy-all:1.6.3"
    compile "org.spockframework:spock-core:0.2-SNAPSHOT"   
  }
}
}}}
